title: Smart Data models - DCAT-AP catalogue Record,
description: This is a Catalogue Record belonging to a dataset according to the DCAT-AP standard 2.0.1

type.description: Property. NGSI entity type. It has to be CatalogueRecordDCAT-AP

primaryTopic.description: Property. Model:'foaf:primaryTopic'. This property links the Catalogue Record to the Dataset, Data service or Catalog described in the record.

modificationDate.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/DateTime'. This property contains the most recent date on which the Catalogue entry was changed or modified..

applicationProfile.description: Property. Model:'dct:conformsTo'. This property refers to an Application Profile that the Datasetâ€™s metadata conforms to

changeType.description: Property. Model:'adms:status'. This property refers to the type of the latest revision of a Dataset's entry in the Catalogue.

listingDate.description: Property. Model:'dct:issued'. This property contains the date on which the description of the Dataset was included in the Catalogue.

language.description: Property. Model:'dct:language'. This property refers to a language used in the textual metadata describing titles, descriptions, etc. of the Dataset. This property can be repeated if the metadata is provided in multiple languages

sourceMetadata.description: Property. Model:'dct:source'. This property refers to the original metadata that was used in creating metadata for the Dataset.

title.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text. This property contains a name given to the Catalogue Record. This property can be repeated for parallel language versions of the name.
